artist: Artist: William Chawner; Artist: George Henning
creditline: Gift of an Anonymous Twin Cities Friend
description: sterling silver dinner plate from the Tula Service; originally belonging to the Governors of Tula
markings: Russian Imperial Eagle engraved at upper rim; \'Urn, a, lion and crest/14\', stamped at underside of rim; \'(Symbol) 1:14\', engraved at underside rim next to \'14\' stamp
object_name: Plate from the dinner service of the Governors of Tula, Russia
title: Plate from the dinner service of the Governors of Tula, Russia
